name: Tomten
description:
Tomten is a game where you play as a forest gnome who likes porridge.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This is a game made in AGS (Adventure Game Studio) by me.
It's a short point and click game where you solve simple puzzles and interact with objects.
I have worked with this game for about 8 hours and made everything except the music. :) 

This game is made for an Advent Calendar for the Indie game dev community in Gothenburg.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits:

Game design, scripting and art: Morgis

Music: The song "The winter castle" is made by erger562 
https://freesound.org/people/erger562/
